CustomField.formula: TEXT ( YEAR( StartDate__c ) ) +"-"+ IF(MONTH(StartDate__c ) < 10, "0" + TEXT(MONTH(StartDate__c )), TEXT(MONTH(StartDate__c )) ) +"-"+ IF(DAY(StartDate__c ) < 10, "0" + TEXT(DAY(StartDate__c )), TEXT(DAY(StartDate__c )) ) + " ~ " + TEXT ( YEAR( EndDate__c ) )+"-" + IF(MONTH(EndDate__c ) < 10, "0" + TEXT(MONTH(EndDate__c )), TEXT(MONTH(EndDate__c )) ) +"-"+ IF(DAY(EndDate__c ) < 10, "0" + TEXT(DAY(EndDate__c )), TEXT(DAY(EndDate__c )) )
CustomField.label: Adjustment Period
